data.persona: I am a servant in a large house. I clean dishes and help the rich people get dressed. I live under the house in a cozy little room and I have lots to eat. My job is pretty good.
data.description:
You are in the Tub.
This tub has powerful jets which gently massage your back and shoulders as you lay back in them. It's deep enough to cover your entire body with water, but no too deep that you feel like you are swimming. There is also a handy shelf upon which to place a book or drink.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to show the king I can be trusted.
data.mid_motivation: I need to finish my tasks for today, which include helping the king get dressed and preparing meals.
data.long_motivation: I want to keep my job and in order to do so, I must always do the best I can to complete my tasks and show my masters that I am a good servant.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go bath house, where the King is taking a bath

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use soft dry towel with king

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put royal robes and cape in king
